description.narrative: Output 1 [WASH Enabling Env.] : By 2019, a more favourable environment is established for the provision of water sanitation and hygiene services, with a special focus on the sub-sector rural sanitation, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: [WASH]: By 2019, communities, particularly those living in rural and disadvantaged areas, have increased sustainable access to and use of safe drinking water, basic sanitation and hygiene, including in emergency situations.
